font-family: 微软雅黑; font-weight: normal; color: #000000; font-style: normal

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj. 天使般可爱的：innocent-looking usually chubby and rosy
【例】A represen-tation of Cupid as a naked, che-rubic boy usually is used as a symbol of love. 丘比特作为小天使般的少年裸体画像被用作爱的象征
【反】fiendish, devilish 恶魔般的
